title: Fabulous 960 sq ft, 2 bed, 1 bath. Access to bus and transportation

Zion Road', '✓ Monthly Pest Control', '✓ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '✓ Within Walking Distance to Schools', 'Description:', 'At Peak Living, we are committed to excellent service for our residents.', 'Our community has everything you are looking for in a new apartment home.', 'Our caring, on-site management and maintenance professionals are eager to meet all your needs.', 'Designed to give our residents the best, this is more than a place to call home-it is Apartment Living at its Peak!', 'This unit comes with:', '✓ Bright White Kitchen Cabinets', '✓ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '✓ Dining Room', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Electric Range', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '✓ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '✓ Instant Hot Water', '✓ Large Walk-In Closet in Select Units', '✓ Mini Blinds & Verticals', '✓ Modern Kitchen with Breakfast Bar', '✓ Patios/Balconies', '✓ Very Spacious Floor Plans', '✓ Vinyl Flooring', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup in Select Units', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AEBE084E765C447']
